üìú About Chinese Zodiac

The Chinese Zodiac follows a 12-year cycle, with each year represented by an animal. Combined with the five elements (Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal, Water) rotating every 2 years, this creates a 60-year cycle of unique combinations that shape your personality, strengths, and life path.
